message.content:
I need to identify the specific line item and value representing the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period.

Looking at the financial statements, the carrying amount of inventories sold would be reported in the income statement as "Cost of Goods Sold" (COGS). This line item represents the cost of inventory that was sold to customers during the reporting period.

From the income statement provided:
- The "Cost of Goods Sold" is reported as 3,140,000.00
- This is dated January 28, 2024

This value represents the carrying amount of inventories that were sold during the reporting period.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '3140000.00'} }
```
